price: 56. Ee ooga salaadda, bxiyana Zakada, oo adeeca Rasuulka si la idiinku naxariisto.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
